name: Pyke
title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
r_dispalyname: Death from Below /  Death from Below 2

i.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
i.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

q.name: Bone Skewer
q.description: Pyke either stabs enemies in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

w.name: Ghostwater Dive
w.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.

e.name: Phantom Undertow
e.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemies along its path.

r.name: Death From Below
r.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pyke's''' maximum health cannot increase except through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]], instead he gains{{ft|{{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}} {{as|per 14 '''bonus''' health}}|{{as|({{fd|7.143}}% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.

'''Pyke''' also stores {{pp|key=%|30 to 81}} of the damage he takes from enemy champions as ''Grey Health'' on his {{as|health bar}}, up to 80 {{as|(+ 800% '''bonus''' AD)}}, with an upper cap of {{as|60% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
When '''Pyke''' is unseen by enemies, he rapidly consumes his ''Grey Health'' to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
i1.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
notes: * Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g {{ii|Cinderhulk}}, {{iis|Gargoyle Stoneplate}}, {{ri|Overgrowth}}) will increase the health before getting converted by ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'', thus granting increased {{as|bonus AD}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Gift of the Drowned Ones's'' healing cap.
*'''Pyke's''' ''Grey Health'' does not have a time limit, and will stay on his {{as|health bar}} until '''Pyke''' leaves enemy vision or dies.

* Since '''Pyke's''' '''maximum''' health cannot be increased, ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'' reaches {{as|60% of '''maximum''' health}} at {{pp|(0.6*(600+100*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))-80)/8|color=ad}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
* Amount of attack damage granted from list of items that grants health, converted with ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'':
{{stat table header|item}}{{Do for every item|item table row|p1n=2|p1v=pykehealth}}
{{stat table footer}}

riot.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
riot.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

riot.name: Bone Skewer
riot.description: Pyke either stabs enemies in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
riot.tooltip:
Tap: Pyke stabs all enemies in front of him dealing {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) physical damage.

Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, pulling the first enemy struck towards him and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Targets hit by either attack are slowed by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

Tapping deals {{ e0 }}% damage to minions and monsters beyond the closest.

description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Pyke''' {{ct|windup|winds up|cast=interrupts|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can use trinkets}} for up to 3 seconds, increasing ''Bone Skewer's'' range by up to 700 units while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} After a brief delay, '''Pyke''' hurls his harpoon forward, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy struck, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them a fixed 550 units towards him and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90% for 1 second.

Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.5}} seconds causes '''Pyke''' to thrust his harpoon forward in a line after a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, dealing 115% damage and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies by 90% for 1 second. The stab deals 30% damage to minions and monsters beyond the closest.

If '''Pyke''' is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Bone Skewer'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.
q1.name: Bone Skewer
notes: * Since the pull is a fixed distance, '''Pyke''' will throw enemies behind him if he uses the ability at close range.
* If '''Pyke''' casts the ability while it's on cooldown he will be unable to receive movement or attack commands for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
q1.target_range: {{pp|type=channel time|7|400;400 to 1100|0;0.5 to 1|displayformula=400+(140 per 0.1 seconds, starting at 0.5 seconds). ''This is capped at 1 second.''}}

riot.name: Ghostwater Dive
riot.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.
riot.tooltip:
Pyke gains Camouflage and {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f7 }}%) decaying movement speed for {{ e0 }} seconds.

Stealth - Camouflage: Pyke is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' enters {{tip|camouflage}} and gains 40% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 1 Lethality)}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 5 seconds. Enemies are notified if '''Pyke''' is within X-units of them.
Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends {{tip|camouflage}}.
w1.name: Ghostwater Dive
notes: * When '''Pyke''' is hidden nearby in his ''Ghostwater Dive'', sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played.

riot.name: Phantom Undertow
riot.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemies along its path.
riot.tooltip: Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him. After a short delay the phantom returns to Pyke, striking all enemies along its path dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} <scaleLethality>(+{{ f10.01 }})</scaleLethality> seconds.

description: After 1 second, the phantom returns to '''Pyke''', dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies it passes through for {{fd|1.1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 10 Lethality)}} seconds.
e1.name: Phantom Undertow
notes: * The phantom hitbox is {{tt|100|approximative}} units radius. {{Pending for test}}
* The returning phantom can be blocked by {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.

riot.name: Death From Below
riot.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
riot.tooltip:
Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, blinking to and executing targets below {{ rdamage }} health. Enemies not executed instead take physical damage equal to the threshold.

When an enemy champion dies in the X from any source, an assisting ally also gains full kill gold and Pyke may re-cast Death From Below again within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds.

Total gold granted: {{ f9 }}

description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.75}}-second delay, '''Pyke''' strikes in an X-shaped area, {{as|executing|true damage}} enemy {{tip|champions}} below {{pp|250;290;330;370;400;430;450;470;490;510;530;540;550|6 to 18}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}} per 1 Lethality)}} {{as|health}} while dealing the same amount as {{as|physical damage}} to enemies not within the threshold for execution.

If ''Death from Below'' hits an enemy champion, '''Pyke''' will {{tip|blink}} to the center of the X. If an enemy champion dies in the X, the last assisting ally is granted full {{g|kill gold}}, and '''Pyke''' gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.
r1.name: Death from Below
notes: * The ally designated for ''Death from Below's'' gold does not receive assist gold. Instead, they receive an item called {{ii|'Your Cut'}} that can be consumed to gain the full gold bounty. If their inventory is full, it's auto-consumed.
* When {{ii|'Your Cut'}} is consumed, it quickly grants {{g|100}} stacks until reaching the full bounty value.
** The item can stack, and they are all consumed at once if one is consumed. The stack limit is 255, stacks beyond this amount will reset them back to 1 but total gold from stacks remains unaffected.
** This does not count as a kill for the purposes of {{tip|takedown}} effects, although it still counts as an assist where applicable.

* To ensure death, the execution first deals {{as|100% current health}} as true damage, then, if the target is still alive, increases by additional cycles of true damage in powers of ten from 10 up to 10^6, for a maximum bonus damage of 1,111,110.
** A target with at least 1,111,111 {{tip|shield}} would survive this damage, with its remaining {{as|HP}} depending only on the excess of its shielding.
** Only the target's current health will count as '''Pyke's''' damage in post-game statistics and {{sti|spell vamp}} healing.
*** If the target's current health is less than the {{tt|post-mitigation|after damage modifiers}} non-executing damage, '''Pyke''' will heal less from spell vamp.
* Executing a [[decoy]] (''e.g.: {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}; {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}'') will put ''Death from Below'' on cooldown.
* ''Death from Below'' will not stop if cast before {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}}.
